official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require notification of recalls of drugs and devices, and for other purposes.
short_title: Drug and Device Recall Reporting Act of 1998

summary.text: Drug and Device Recall Reporting Act of 1998 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require a pharmacy that receives notice from a recalling firm of a Class I or Class II recall of a drug or device to notify retail customers that received the drug or device: (1) in writing, for customers receiving the drug or device on prescription; and (2) by public display, for all others. Mandates a civil monetary penalty for violations.
